snippet: Andy Murray thinks he played his best tennis of the tournament during his Australian Open quarter-final victory over David Ferrer on Wednesday after a tough few days when he was distracted by his father-in-law's illness....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray thinks he played his best tennis of the tournament during his Australian Open quarter-final victory over David Ferrer on Wednesday after a tough few days when he was distracted by his father-in-law's illness.

headline.print_headline: Ferrer Victory Was My Best Match, Says Murray
headline.main: Ferrer Victory Was My Best Match, Says Murray
